TopicTitle: Looking for updated information on methods

Articles.Content:
Hello, I started a similar thread in the parent forum, but I figured I'd try to ask a very similar question here, where it seems to be more appropriate.

Is there an updated API or other knowledge base about the available methods and PartModule classes? All the ones that XanderTech listed (wiki, git hub, wiki search) appear to be older, and I was curious what people here use to get module information.

Any help is appreciated, Thanks.

Edited December 28, 2013 by LethalDose

Theres really no API other than that unfortunately. PartModules are pretty straightforward, you just make a class that is a substitute of PArtModule and write your code in it. There's a few method overrides that are useful in it and you can get to them easily by typing "public override void" and the autocomplete will list them. Else just write your code in there and then put the module in the part and you should be good. The best documentation you can find is other people'S source unfortunately.
